Text:
">formerly_azrielle at 2011-05-22 20:18 CET: 
 My daughter thanks you profusely for Water For Elephants, and has a request, Blue Valentine, http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1120985/, which she says is "supposed to be hauntingly well acted"."

Thx twentyforty!

Wondering if you could get a hold of Adams Curtis' documentaries, there is a torrent of it up but the encodes are much bigger than they deserve to be:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5119790/Adam_Curtis_Collection_%28Century_of_the_Self__The_Trap__etc.%29

Apparently they're an incredible expose of what's really going on in the world of power. Unfortunately, unable to download such big files of mediocre quality.

@Yajoo: Google video has big collection, Youtube and few www based video archives too.

Video quality is the same (as ones in torrent) - as you've said "mediocre quality" or much much worse.
Point being, I can make videos smaller (file-sizes) but - I CANNOT make them better (these from torrent).

Aside from that - it is HUGE task, both encoding and later upload and after that seeding - a task for admirers of Curtis's work, not me, I am intrigued enough for watching it - but such task is definitely too big for small capacities I have for accepting it. For what is worth, I am sorry.

@twentyforty

It's no problem, if only there were more like you!

Many thanks for sharing your unique piece-of-art work...+1...A10-V10...
Live Long and Prosper...
Spirit...

@ ALL - Please LOGIN (create an account if you do not have one) and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents you DL from 20-40.  It makes a difference; shows you care and that his work is appreciated! Don't forget to seed back at least 1/1...

Be Cool !
Thank You!  Hope all is OK with you.
Download complete.  DAMN that was fast.  Thank You.
